description: Plentiful Harvest Event: You get one resource of your choice!
Brigand Attack: If you have more than 7 resources you lose all your gold and wool supplies.

description.template: You lost $iterateResources{lostResources} from the Brigand Attack.

description: Celebration: If you have the most skill points, you alone receive 1 resource of your choice. Otherwise, each player receives 1 resources of their choice.
Trade: If you have the trade advantage, you receive 1 resource of your choice from your opponent.
